description:
Players are divided into two roles: the goldfish (Werewolf) who wants to swim around unseen, and the scoopers (Villagers) who want to scoop up the Werewolf.
<Goldfish>
Pass through the checkpoints without being detected to win!
<Scoopers>
Find the Werewolf Goldfish and scoop it up to win!

Fool your opponents, and victory will be yours!

Up to 4 players can play together!

Online play is available!

[Quick Match]
Play a quick battle with the basic ruleset!

[Room Match]
Decide the rules and battle!

[Keyword Match]
Set a room keyword and battle with friends!

Enjoy a battle of trickery with players from all over the world!
Play "Werewolf Goldfish" with friends and people worldwide!
name: Werewolf Goldfish
